title: ????(Virtua Tennis).exe
description:
Virtua Tennis RIP with all unlock + trainer

Game Notes:
~~~~~~~~~~~
The Sega number one seed that brought the crowd to it&#039;s feet is back
to serve an ace on PC. All your favourite players and rallies are here
- now with enhanced graphics and added Network Play! Maintaining the
grand-slamming gameplay of the original version, Virtua Tennis is sure
to keep any game player riveted to the net!

Game Features:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Simple to control, yet deep strategies are there for those who wish
to uncover them...

- Realistic 3D environments and fluid animations.

- Play on concrete, grass, clay and carpet - each surface behaves
differently.

- Seven internationally ranked tennis players to choose from.

- Now with Network Play - championship winning multiplayer gaming!
